comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content:
While employed by the Florida Folklife Program, Nusz worked on Folk Arts in Rural Education, the Southwest Florida Folk Arts Project, the Maritime Heritage Survey Project, the Pursuits and Pastimes exhibit, the Miami-Dade Folklife Survey, Rural Folklife Days, and the Ida Goodson Recording Project. 

Nusz later became the director of the Oregon Folklife Program.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
